Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl

Class AnalysisServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl.AnalysisServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnalysisService
public class AnalysisServiceImpl extends Object implements AnalysisService
A service able to retrieve various kinds of statistics, delegates to JSwordAnalysisServiceImpl for some operations.

      public CombinedPassageStats getStatsForPassage(String version, String reference, StatType statType, ScopeType scopeType, boolean nextChapter, String userLanguage, boolean mostOccurrences)
      Description copied from interface: AnalysisService
      Obtains stats for a particular versions, word stats, strong stats and subject stats
      Specified by:
      getStatsForPassage in interface AnalysisService
      Parameters:
      version - the version
      reference - the reference
      statType - the type of analysis that we will do
      scopeType - restricts to a particular chapter/1 chapter either side/book
      nextChapter - perform analysis on next chapter, not this one
      Returns:
      the all stats
